pronunciation.pinyin: táng láng bǔ chán , huáng què zài hòu
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: tang2 lang2 bu3 chan2 , huang2 que4 zai4 hou4

meanings.value: the mantis stalks the cicada, unaware of the oriole behind (idiom, from Daoist classic Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3]); to pursue a narrow gain while neglecting a greater danger
